name: Loaded Dice (AndrewRobot12)
description:
fun game of rolling and dropping dice

how to play: fist the objective of the game is to drop dice into a truck but the number of the die has to match the number on the truck. If you hit the truck with the correct die you will score as many points as the number on the truck and it will be loaded and you cant drop another die in it but it gets unloaded when it goes off the screen. You can roll dice by left clicking and you can drop dice by right clicking here's a picture:

 

A timer at the bottom of the screen shows how much time you have to score points

and here's a video of a tutorial:
